description:
While on the run from Lum, Ataru runs into a strange priestess who ends up becoming the school nurse?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La dame mystérieuse / Un virus en détresse
Nazo no Oiroke Bijo Sakura / Nayameru Virus
Sakura, Raving Beauty of Mystery / Virus in Distress
Sakura, bellezza misteriosa - Un terribile virus
謎のお色気美女 サクラ - 悩めるウイルス
